name: Intel Core i9-13900K
description: 13th Gen Intel Core i9 processor, 24 cores (8P+16E), up to 5.8GHz, unlocked for overclocking, ideal for high-end gaming and content creation.

name: AMD Ryzen 9 7950X
description: AMD Ryzen 7000 series, 16 cores / 32 threads, 4.5GHz base clock up to 5.7GHz boost, optimized for gaming and professional workloads.

name: ASUS ROG Strix Z790-E
description: Premium Intel Z790 motherboard, supports DDR5 memory, PCIe 5.0, advanced cooling and networking for high-performance builds.

name: MSI B650 Tomahawk
description: AMD B650 motherboard with robust power delivery, DDR5 support, PCIe 4.0 slots, and high-quality audio for gaming builds.

name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090
description: Flagship GPU from NVIDIA, 24GB GDDR6X, ultimate 4K and AI performance for gaming and creative workloads.

name: AMD Radeon RX 7900 XTX
description: Top-end AMD GPU, 24GB GDDR6, excellent 4K gaming performance, ray tracing and AI-enhanced graphics support.

name: Corsair Vengeance DDR5 32GB (2x16GB) 6000MHz
description: High-speed DDR5 memory kit optimized for gaming and multitasking, low latency and reliable performance.

name: Samsung 980 Pro 2TB NVMe SSD
description: Ultra-fast PCIe Gen4 NVMe SSD, 2TB capacity, high durability and read/write speeds for gaming and content creation.

name: Corsair RM1000x 1000W PSU
description: High-efficiency 80+ Gold power supply, fully modular, quiet operation, designed for high-end gaming and workstation builds.

name: Noctua NH-D15 CPU Cooler
description: Premium air cooler, dual tower design, excellent thermal performance, quiet operation for overclocked CPUs.

name: Logitech G502 HERO Gaming Mouse
description: High-performance wired gaming mouse with 16000 DPI sensor, customizable buttons, and RGB lighting.

name: Razer BlackWidow V3 Keyboard
description: Mechanical gaming keyboard with Razer Green switches, customizable RGB lighting, and durable design.

name: NZXT H510 Elite Case
description: Premium mid-tower case with tempered glass, optimized airflow, and modern cable management for custom builds.

name: Phanteks Eclipse P500A
description: High airflow ATX case with mesh front panel, versatile interior for water cooling, and RGB options.

name: SiliconCove Gamer Build
description: Custom gaming build with Intel Core i7, NVIDIA RTX 4070, 16GB DDR5, 1TB NVMe SSD, fully tested and ready to play.

name: SiliconCove Creator Build
description: Workstation build for creators with AMD Ryzen 9, NVIDIA RTX 4080, 32GB RAM, 2TB NVMe, optimized for video editing and 3D rendering.
